caller_intent: Dale wants to finalize an insurance policy by getting it bonded, set up payment terms, and clarify refund policies for future refinancing.
resolution_steps: Jeff confirms Dale's intent to close the policy and discusses payment options (full payment vs. installments).
Jeff explains that the bill will come from USLI and clarifies payment timing (post-signing).
Jeff outlines the e-signature process via Congress Sign and assures Dale about policy binding.
Jeff confirms refund terms for unearned premiums if Dale refinances later.
summary: Dale and Jeff finalize an insurance policy, agreeing to full payment and e-signature process. Jeff clarifies billing, binding, and refund terms for future refinancing. Dale confirms readiness to proceed.
